author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) is offering a special offer including 10 per cent additional data for its customers between February 13 and 20, said a release from K. Sajju George, General Manager, Nagercoil Telecom District here on Saturday.

Schemes

Mr. George said the offer was available for data schemes such as STV 78, STV 96, STV 155, STV 198, STV 239, STV 292, STV 444, STV 451, STV 561, STV 821, STV 1099, STV 1949 and STV 3099.

Combo voucher

Besides these, the BSNL was introducing a new combo voucher for a value of Rs. 1402 from February 13 to March 31 (only on EC recharge) with the following facilities – main account would get a credit of Rs. 1402, All Pan India Calls at 0.9 paise per second (30 days), 250 MB data (30 days) and 250 SMS for all networks (for 30 days).

New SMS voucher STV 15 would be introduced from February 13 with 2000 SMS (Local/STD) for all networks (27 days validity).

Full talk time would be given to EC recharge for a value of Rs. 220 between February 15 and 17, Mr. George said.
title: BSNL’s 10 per cent extra data offer under way
